metadata.name: Scaffold Quarkus Microservice
metadata.shortDescription: Scaffold a new Quarkus microservice from team practices, Quarkus guidance, and Git workflow standards
metadata.description: This skill scaffolds a Quarkus microservice by strictly enforcing practices from the local practices folder. It follows Propose-Confirm-Act, verifies Git worktree + branch safety before writing files, and applies universal coding standards plus Quarkus microservice scaffolding guidance.
objectives: Load and enforce relevant practices before scaffolding
Verify Git worktree + new branch before writing files
Propose a minimal, standards-compliant Quarkus microservice baseline
Generate a runnable Quarkus microservice with tests and quality gates
